meanings.definition: A person or thing that infects.
meanings.sent1: The infecter spread germs to everyone in the room.
meanings.sent2: The doctor identified the infecter of the virus outbreak.
meanings.sent3: The sneezing infecter was not invited to the party.
meanings.sent4: The infecter of laughter made the whole class giggle.
meanings.sent5: The invisible infecter lurked in the air, waiting to strike.

meanings.definition: A verb meaning to contaminate with a disease-causing organism.
meanings.sent1: Be careful not to touch the infecter of the illness.
meanings.sent2: The infecter quickly spread the flu throughout the school.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous infecter contaminated the cookies with sprinkles.
meanings.sent4: His smile was an infecter, spreading joy to all who saw it.
meanings.sent5: The infecter of fear crept into their minds, causing panic.
